former gangster James "Animal" Allen (Ving Rhames) serves a life 
sentence at Folsom Prison. When a riot breaks out between the 
Blacks and Mexicans, Animal is transferred to Susanville Prison. 
While serving his time, Animal learns that his son, James Jr.,
is framed for murder and the one responsible for calling the shots 
is on the inside. He is blackmailed and forced to return to his 
dark past as a fighter in order to save his son. On the outside, 
Darius (played by Vicellous Reon Shannon), now a reformed man, 
maintains his relationship with his father and does everything 
in his power with the help of his lawyer to gather enough 
evidence to clear James Jr&#039;s name.
